data.text:
@timmyvoe Really crazy that anyone thinks any of those things have been a success.

You had I was responsible for the UK handling of Brexit or Covid or Withdrawal from Afghanistan or the UK response to the Ukraine war let's just say I wouldn't hire you as a bin collector.
@timmyvoe Thank christ Labour aren't in power or they'd be kneeling before Putin
@MichaelJRic @Raymond80730582 Just a tip, try not to make it obvious on your profile you are a paid Labour shill 😉 https://t.co/lk2KuPYqqX
@timmyvoe @Raymond80730582 He hid in a fridge because Piers Morgan asked him a question, for fucks sake...
@timmyvoe @MattHarperUK And the delusion walks on... poor chap
@timmyvoe This is a parody account. Boris.... https://t.co/uUVruT87xG

@timmyvoe You can prove everything with facts, so tell me Tim if he handled Brexit (apart from the £350,000,000 to the NHS a week, as we all know that was a lie and hasn’t happened) what guarantees were made before the referendum… just curious
@timmyvoe Quite ironic but when Boris was heckled he ran and hid in a fridge and it was only tv reporters.
@Redrog76Part2 @timmyvoe Well he did do this... https://t.co/7twSy0TMFP
@timmyvoe @SpankinR How about handling the invasion of the UK? Where is his head buried?
